pages.text: 23|75|aur yadi ham unapar daya karen aur door karen, jo duhkh unake saath hai,[1] to ve apane kukarmon mein aur adhik bahakate jaayenge.
23|76|aur hamane unhen yaatana mein grast (bhee) kiya, to apane paalanahaar ke samaksh nahin jhuke aur na vinay karate hain.
23|77|yahaantak ki jab ham unapar khol denge kadee yaatana ke[1] dvaar, to sahasa ve us samay niraash ho jaayenge[2].
23|78|vahee hai, jisane banaaye hain tumhaare lie kaan tatha aankhen aur dil[1], (phir bhee) tum bahut kam krtagy hote ho.
23|79|aur useene tumhen dharatee mein phailaaya hai aur usee kee or ekatr kiye jaoge.
23|80|tatha vahee hai, jo jeevan deta aur maarata hai aur usee ke adhikaar mein hai raatri tatha din ka pher-badal, to kya tum samajh nahin rakhate
23|81|balki unhonne vahee baat kahee, jo agalon ne kahee.
23|82|unhonne kahaah kya jab ham mar jaayenge aur mittee tatha haddiyaan ho jaayenge, to kya ham phir avashy jeevit kiye jaayenge
23|83|hamen tatha hamaare poorvajon ko isase pahale yahee vachan diya ja chuka hai, ye to bas agalon kee kalpit kathaen hain.
23|84|(he nabee!) unase kahoh kisakee hai dharatee aur jo usamen hai, yadi tum jaanate ho
23|85|ve kahenge ki allaah kee. aap kahieh phir tum kyon shiksha grahan nahin karate
23|86|aap poochhie ki kaun hai saaton aakaashon ka svaamee tatha maha sinhaasan ka svaamee
23|87|ve kahengeh allaah hai. aap kahieh phir tum usase darate kyon nahin ho
23|88|aap unase kahie ki kisake haath mein hai, pratyek vastu ka adhikaar? aur vah sharan deta hai aur use koee sharan nahin de sakata, yadi tum gyaan rakhate ho
23|89|ve avashy kahenge ki (ye sab gun) allaah hee ke hain. aap kahieh phir tumapar kahaan se jaadoo[1] ho jaata hai
